channel.title: Seminar on Nicola Rennie
channel.description: Recent content in Seminar on Nicola Rennie

item.title: Women in Stats and Data Science at Lancaster University
item.description: On March 8, 2022, Lancaster University hosted an online panel discussion on the career path of Women in Stats to celebrate International Womens' Day. The speakers were Anastasia Ushakova, Carolina Euan, Emma Eastoe, Kathryn Turnbull and Nicola Rennie. My answers to the five main questions are below: What do you do on a typical day at work? For me, it’s easier to answer this in terms of a typical week rather than typical day since I tend to have quite a varied schedule.
